snippet: President Nicolás Maduro is trying to quell frustration with the economy ahead of municipal elections by forcing retailers to slash prices.
abstract: Venezuelan Pres Nicolas Maduro's entire cabinet has been battling against soaring inflation, appearing on television to advertise the low prices of consumer goods; government has been forcing retailers to slash prices as part of fever-pitch campaign to quell frustration with the economy.
lead_paragraph: President Nicolás Maduro is trying to quell frustration with the economy ahead of municipal elections by forcing retailers to slash prices.

headline.main: In Venezuela, Campaign Takes the Form of a Fire Sale
headline.print_headline: In Venezuela, Campaign Takes the Form of a Fire Sale
